select client_id as id, (select name from t_hana_user where id= e.client_id) as name, substr((select reg_no from t_hana_user where id = e.client_id), 1, 6) as birth, main_category, (SELECT code_val FROM t_hana_code_table WHERE code_key = middle_category AND code_category = 4) as middle_category, title, consulting_report, (select name from t_hana_teller where emp_no = e.teller_emp_no) as admin_name, teller_emp_no as empNo,
case when to_char(to_date(#{reportYMD}), 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(consulting_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') then to_char(consulting_date, 'hh24:mi:ss') else to_char(consulting_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') end as c_date
from t_hana_report e where teller_emp_no = #{empNo} order by consulting_date desc
select client_id as id, to_char(consulting_date, 'yy-mm-dd') as consulting_date from t_hana_report where teller_emp_no = #{empNo} and to_char(consulting_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{reportYMD}
